title: Groundhog Day, The repeating of history. The Warren Markowitz Show, Politically Incorrect, 10/31/2017
description: The Warren Markowitz Show, It's My World You Just Live In It. A soap box for Independent Ideas, current events and politics of the day. The rise of Donald Trump, the fall of Hillary Clinton, the ultimate rise in the SJW, has this happened before? I think so, lets see where the wandering mind and thoughts take and drag us. I believe you will enjoy it. Podcast: Galtspeaks.com (wrm.podomatic.com), Contact: Radio@galtspeaks.com Follow us on twitter.com/radiomarkowitz & Facebook.com/radiomarkowitz Spreaker-www.spreaker.com/show/the-warren-markowitz-show
dc:creator: Warren Markowitz
